1.content: Alright, let's get this out of the way, what move/game/show/etc. do you want to focus on?
1.title: Those Inevitable Choice Chapters

11.content: So, which character will be the main focus?
11.title: Air Buddies

choices: Raid the pantry to make his farts even stronger
111.content:
Budderball lie on the couch, groaning in discomfort. He'd eaten just a bit too much kibble for breakfast and now his stomach was absolutely killing him! "Ugh, I feel soooo full, but it was sooo good!" As Budderball turned over onto his stomach, a loud gurgle sounded in his gut prompting another groan from the pup.

Just then, Budderball's sister Rosebud entered the room, "hey Budderball, you have got to see this great n-" Budderball cut his sister off with another loud moan. "Hey, what's the matter with you? Is it your stomach again? How many times do I have to tell you not to stuff yourself with that stuff? You are such a pig Budderball!"

Buderball glared at his sister, she could be sooo annoying with her nagging, he wished that he could teach her a lesson! At that moment, Budderball's gut gave another gurgle, giving the pup a devilish idea. "I know Rosebud, I'm sorry. Now what was it you wanted to show me?"

Not catching the slight sinister tone in her brother's voice, Rosebud smiled and said, "can't you tell? I just got this fabulous new collar! what do you think?" Rosebud turned her head to the side revealing a shiny new pink collar.

Budderball got down of the couch and padded over to his sister, he got very close and pretended to examine the scarf before saying "what do I think? THIS is what I think!" At that moment, Budderball spun around and planted his butt in his sister's face. Before she could react, Budderball let loose with a thundering PFFFFFFFRRRRRRPPPPPTTTTTTT! Budderball couldn't contain his laughter and started to giggle uncontrollably, especially when he turned around and saw his sister cross eyed and swaying back and forth, hardly able to stand after being hit with such a potent stench.

"Ugh B-Budderball! Y-you're so... so... disgustiiii..." *PLOP* down she went,completely unconscious from the nasty stench of Budderball's gas.

This only made Budderball laugh even harder, he had no idea his farts were this powerful! And the look on his sister's face! Absolutely priceless. In fact, it was so hilarious that Budderball decided to...
111.title: Budderball

1112.content:
Budderball giggled at the thought of his brothers being forced to inhale his raunchy gas. He couldn't believe that he'd never thought of this prank before! After a bit of searching, Budderball found his brother Buddha meditating in the backyard... with his eyes shut. With a rumbling stomach and a smirk on his face, Budderball crept over to his meditating brother. Once he got close enough, Budderball turned around and stuck his butt out until it was mere inches away from Buddha's face.

The stench of his previous fart still lingered on Budderball's behind. He could see Buddha's face scrunch up when he caught a whiff of it. Still, the pup tried to continue meditating despite the smell, "oooommmm... ooooommmmmm... ooommmmmm ...ooooommmmmmMY GOSH WHAT IS THAT SME- MMMMPPPPHHH!!" At that exact moment, Budderball pushed his butt into Buddha's face and sat down, trapping his brother under his smelly rump.

Laughing, Budderball shouted to his struggling brother, "oh hey there Buddha, just thought I'd help you find your inner peace! Come on now, do it with me. Breathe in..."

FFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRBBBBPPPPPPTTTTT!

"And breathe out." Buddha couldn't believe it, his brother just farted in his face! Buddha's eyes instantly started to water as the powerful, eggy stench forced it's way into his nose. He kicked, screamed and squirmed but nothing Buddha did could budge his much heavier brother. "Come on Buddha, we just started! Now, breathe in..."

PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRFFFFFFFFFTTTTTT!!!

"And breathe out." Buddha's vision started to get blurry and his struggling got weaker. Still, Budderball continued, "Breathe in..."

BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPP

"And breathe out." Everything was going dark, Buddha's struggles ceased and all he could do now was whimper in disgust as Budderball again said, "Breathe in..."

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTT TT!!!

Unable to handle the stench any longer, Buddha fainted. "And pass out. Nice work Buddha, you look so peaceful now!" Budderball stood up off his unconscious brother and said, "alright, who's next? Hmmmm, I think I'll go find B-Dawg and show him some new 'music' that I wrote!"

Budderball wandered about the house until he found B-Dawg hanging out in the kitchen where...
1112.title: Prank one of his brothers

11122.content:
Two in one...excellent! Budder could barely believe his luck - but he didn't think he could take both of them at the same time. He could if he hadn't unleashed his very worst on the last two dogs but he had the perfect idea as to how to separate B-Dawg and Mudbud.

"Hey you guys! You wanna play Hide and Seek?"

"What, that? Now? Hold up, I don't think I -" B-Dawg started, but Mudbud interrupted with his tail wagging happily; "Sound great! You gotta be it first though Budderball!"

"Of course! You better be fast though, I'm only counting to thirty!"

"Wait, I didn't even say - MUDBUD, hold up man!" B-Dawg called but Mudbud had already raced out of sight. B-Dawg had just enough time to roll his eyes a bit before he was rugby-tackled by Budderball.

"H-hey -" B-Dawg gasped but Budder had always parked his still stinky rear on his face.

"Better start counting! One...FRRRRRRRRRT...Two...BRRRRRRRRRP...Three...PFFFFFFFRT..."

B-Dawg had barely enough time to get over the shock of what Budder was doing as he struggled but Budder farted thick and fast, not giving his brother any chance of fresh air.

"Fifteen...BRRRRRRRRRRRRRAP....Sixteen...PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRT...Sev enteen....BLLLLLLLLLLRRRRRRRRRRRRT...."

The farts only got louder and smellier as Budder counted to thirty and B-Dawg simply couldn't hack it. He became the third dog to pass out to Budderball after he counted to 25 but he still had five more farts to rip and rip them he did, all the way to thirty!

Jumping off and smirking down at his handiwork Budder took a small detour to take two or three mouthfuls of food from a nearby bin before looking for Mudbud, who was...
11122.title: He was talking to Mudbud

choices: "It looks like Rosebud's waking up, why don't you give it a try Mudbud?"
111221.content:
Budder wandered about the house for a little while, searching for his brother. Until he found Mudbud desperately fanning Rosebud with a paw, trying to wake her up, "come on Rosebud! Wake up! Please wake up sis!" Mudbud looked up and spotted Budderball making his way over to him, "hey Budderball, I know we were playing, but I think something's wrong with Rosebud!" He turned back to his unconscious sister and continued frantically fanning her.

Budderball smirked, "oh don't worry about Rosebud bro, she's fine. She just passed out after I farted in her face."

Mudbud looked up at his brother, unable to believe that what he thought he just heard was correct. "Wait, you did what now!?"

Budder's smirk turned into a full blown proud smile, "yep! Farted right in her face! It must have really stunk too, I only had to fart once to knock her out, It took B-Dawg like... twenty-five or something."

Mudbud was shocked at his brother's behavior, "wait, you did this to B-Dawg too? Why?!"

"Because it's both fun and funny! You should have seen the look on Buddha's face when I did it to him. And while we're on the topic of gassing our siblings..."
111221.title: Desperately trying to revive Rosebud

choices: Four gold furred butts surrounding him!
That the room was completely empty, everyone must be hiding from him.
1112212.content:
Mudbud's eyes went wide with fear, "now h-hold on a sec Budderball, let's talk about thi-" Poor Mudbud didn't even have time to finish his sentence before his brother tackled him to the ground and sat down on his face. The residual stench from Budder's previous farts was enough to make the pup retch and gag.

"Sorry bro, but the time for talking's over. Now just lie back, relax, and smell my farts!" As soon as Budder finished his sentence, his gut gurgled audibly and his butt let lose with a thunderous
PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH HHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT T!!

The putrid butt bomb was so loud that every pup in the house would have surely woken up if Budder's stinky gas hadn't been the reason for their slumber. And the smell! This single fart made the one that knocked Rosebud out seem like air freshener! The noxious, eggy stench quickly filled the room to the brim and it was so gut-wrenchingly foul that even Budderball had to cover his nose!


Now, any other pup would have passed out after a single sniff of the abomination Budder's butt hat just produced. However, Mudbud loved to get filthy and as such, was used to stinky things. Now that doesn't mean that the fart hadn't affected him, in fact, the poor young labrador was so dizzy from his brother's raunchy gas that it looked like (and smelled like) there were two dogs farting on him!

With a paw over his nose, Budderball commended his brother's resilience,"wow Mudbud, I can't believe you didn't pass out! I guess I saved the best for last huh? Unfortunately though, you won't be staying awake for much longer!" Budderball made good on his word and doused his brother with a noxious barrage of flatulence.
PRRRRRFFFT! FFFFRRRRRRTTT! BBBBRRRRRRRPPPP! PPPHHHIIIIIIRRRRRTTT! PPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTT! FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRPPPP! PPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHHHHTTTTT! And after one last paint-peeling SBD, Mudbud passed out.

Budder stood up off his brother with his tail wagging, "well It's been fun bro, but I'm tired, I think I'll take a nap now." With that, Budder jumped up on the couch and fell into a peaceful slumber. He awoke three hours later to see...
1112212.title: "It's your turn bro..."

choices: They were organising a farting contest in front of him.
They threatened to gang up on him again unless he willingly served the four.
11122121.content:
Budder didn't quite register what was happening until the first fart blew across his face - that from Mudbud to the far right. It was an airy but disgusting blast that immediately irritated the pup's sense of smell and had him sneezing from it.

Budder being Budder was used to farts and just one he could take but then both Buddha and B-Dawg blasted him at the same time -

PHHHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPT
BLLLLRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPT

- and already it had him coughing and struggling, though he found that he couldn't move his legs. Had - had he been tied up?!

"H-hey - No - cut it out -" Budder coughed but was interrupted when Rosebud let her ass drop full-weight on Budder's face temporarily.

"Sorry Budder but you've had your fun!" Rose mocked, letting out an SBD as she spoke. It was foul enough to make Buddha wince away from it. "Now it's our turn!"

With that Rose raised her rear again, allowing the other three to have their smelly way with Budder. For the next five or so minutes all the quartet did was break wind and every single blast of gas Budder was forced to sniff up. He struggled, gagged and protested for the first minute but grew weaker and weaker as the smell got to him. Individually none of his siblings could produce his stink but together it was simply overwhelming and by the time he finally had a break from the farts he was weak, unable to do anything but watch and sniff at the fumes that tormented him so.

"we all still have farts right" Buddha asked the others, his normally calm voice now with a hint of mirth.

"Oh, definitely!" Mudbud said. "In fact, get a load of -"

"N-no..please....I don't want to..." Budder moaned.

PHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT
BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRT
BRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP
PRRRRRRRRRRRRT BRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT FRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPTPTPTPTPPT PHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRRRT

Were the response of his siblings and it proved too much for Budder who passed out right then and there.

Once Budder had awakened he found himself untied but in a cage. What's more, a long lead had been attached to his collar...but what were the plans of his siblings?
11122121.title: Four gold furred butts surrounding him!

choices: The others leave and Buddha starts to torture Budderball
One (or more) of the pups is upset about the order and they start fighting
111221212.content:
All four of Budder's siblings stood outside the cage, grinning mischievously at him. Rosebud spoke up first, "oh hey there Budderball, sleep well?"

Budderball whimpered, "p-please... don't do that again!"

Mudbud chuckled, "oh don't worry bro, we won't."

Budderball breathed a sigh of relief.

"But," continued B-Dawg, "we're all still really gassy so here's the deal. You're gonna sniff our gas individually until we all run out."

Budderball winced at the thought, but knew that it was better than the alternative, "a-alright, I'll do it."

"Good choice," shouted Rosebud, "so here's how this'll work, each of us will let out one fart on you and you'll rate them in order of least smelly to most. Whoever has the worst gas will get you last and the pup with the least smelly fart will go first."

Before Budderball could complain, B-Dawg opened the cage and sat down on Budderball's face.

FFFFRRRRTTT!

Budder sniffed at the fart and coughed a bit from the eggy stench but was otherwise unaffected.

"Aww man!" Complained B-Dawg.

Buddha chuckled, "step aside brother, let me show you how it is done." B-Dawg moved aside and Buddha sat down.

PPPTTT!

The tiny fart hardly fazed Budder at all, he had absolutely no trouble sniffing it up.

B-Dawg laughed, "ha! You sure showed me bro!

Buddha grumbled but got off of Budderball's face just in time for Mudbud to bound over and plop his butt down. "My turn!" Suddenly, Mudbud's butt exploded with a trumpeting PPPPPPPPHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTT!! That left Budderball, B-Dawg, and Buddha all gasping for air.

"Oh man, that's *cough* that's nasty Mudbud!" Complained B-Dawg as he choked on the stench.

"Well, at least we know who's going last," said Rosebud as she fanned the air with a paw. The pups waited for five minutes for the air to clear before Rosebud trotted over and sat down on Budderball's face. She released an SBD that, while more potent than B-Dawg's and Buddha's farts, was nowhere near as bad as Mudbud's.

Buddha smiled, "alright, looks like I get him first, then B-Dawg, then Rosebud, then Mudbud. Now if you would kindly leave so I may begin."
111221212.title: They threatened to gang up on him again unless ...

choices: Budder panicked and tried to escape
B-Dawg came in to take his turn
1112212121.content:
Budder didn't know how he could get out of this situation but inwardly he reasoned to himself that he would have no problem enduring Buddha. He could overpower him one-on-one, sure but that would just cause the other three to come running back and the memory of their combined attack was still painfully fresh in his mind.

"Are you ready for this dear brother?" Buddha asked with a smile once the others had left.

"Of - of course I'm ready, your farts are pathetic!" was Budder's reply, trying to sound confident. The smile never left Buddha's face as he trotted forward and let his ass fall on Budder's face.

"I wouldn't be so sure! BLLLLllRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPT!"

What Buddha had just ripped was so much worse than Budder thought him capable of and immediately he started kicking and wriggling but -

"Remember your deal Budder! Do you want the others back in here?

Budder whimpered but ceased his struggling, even as a second fart was blown over him. He realised Buddha must have held back so that he could go first and tried to keep his coughing under control - and failed once again! For the next half an hour he was at the mercy of the dog's rear as Buddha meditated whilst sitting on his face. Every minute or so another fart would sneak out of him and Budder would be forced to endure and sniff it up until the smell was gone...at which point the next fart would be well on his way. It was getting to the point where Budder just couldn't take it anymore...
1112212121.title: The others leave and Buddha starts to torture B...

choices: B-Dawg announced that he would stop holding back
11122121212.content:
After a peaceful half-hour meditation session for Buddha, and a smelly half-hour of hell for Budderball, Buddha opened his eyes and stood up off of Budderball. "Well brother, it's been fun but I'm all out of gas now. We really should do this again sometime!"

Buddha left the room, leaving Budderball still leashed to the cage. A few minutes later, B-Dawg came trotting into the room. "Whew! Smells like Buddha really did a number on you bro! Hope you're ready though, 'cause I've spent the whole past half hour chowing down and getting ready for you." Budderball whimpered as his face was squished under his brother's butt, though he knew that the worst was yet to come.

PPPPPHHHHHHRRRRRTT!

The first fart blew against Budderball's face and he immediately knew that this was going to be so much worse than Buddha. The rotten stench was absolutely appalling, whatever B-Dawg had been eating really did a number on his digestive system!

FFFFRRRRRRRRRRPPPTTTTT! PPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTT! PPPPPPPPPTTTTTTTT!

The farts went on and on, getting smellier by the second. Budderball surely would have bolted by this point if he wasn't already so weak from his brother's horrific gas. The torture continued for about an hour, at which point...
11122121212.title: B-Dawg came in to take his turn

111221212121.content:
After a half hour of bombarding his brother with the most nauseating farts he could muster, B-Dawg stood up off of Budderball. "Wow, you're pretty tough bro! I thought for sure you would have passed out. Well, I'm out of gas now so I'll be going. Have fun sniffing Rosebud's gas!"

Budderball whimpered meekly, "n-no... I don't want to."

B-Dawg just laughed, "you don't have a choice bro! Now you just sit tight, I'm gonna go get her for you." With a gleeful smile, B-Dawg left the room, leaving Budderball to lie there choking on the residual stench of farts.

A few minutes later, the door opened and Rosebud came trotting up to her brother. Once she got close, Rosebud sniffed the air and gagged before holding her nose with a paw, "Eeeeeeewwwww! You stink Budderball! B-Dawg and Buddha must have really done a number on you. Don't worry, I can get rid of that nasty smell for you with my own 'special perfume'."

Budder stood up shakily and started to back away from his sister, "Rosebud please! Don't do this, I've learned my lesson I promise. Please don't make me smell any more farts!" Budderball's butt hit the back of the cage, leaving him nowhere to go as his grinning sister approached.

"Sorry Budderball, but you know the deal. Either you sniff my farts or we all gang up on you again!" Rosebud turned around and stuck her butt in Budderball's face. She then started to ewalk backwards, first forcing Budderball into a sitting position and then pushing his head against the wall of the cage. With her brother's head securely pinned, Rosebud grinned and let out a paint-peeling SBD that shot right up Budder's nose.

Budder took one whiff of his sister's near-lethal fart and...
111221212121.title: B-Dawg ran out of gas

choices: He had become too physically weak to struggle.
He was holding his breath, and hoping Rose wouldn't notice
An impatient Mudbud had interrupted Rosebud
1112212121212.content:
It was atrocious - no, that was far too mild a word! Budder was only prevented from screaming because it would mean having to swallow down Rosebud's potent gas.

"Ewww!" Rosebud groaned at the scent of her own gas. "That is so nasty! I almost feel sorry for you, Budderball!" Rose took a couple of moments to waft a paw in front of her own face before -

~brrrrrrrrrrrrpt!

It still stank, but Budder hardly noticed. He was still trying to get away from the SBD that Rose had released earlier.

"You forget about your end of the deal?" Rose cooed. "Or do I have to tell the others that you HAVEN'T learnt your lesson?"

Budder whimpered, but did as he was told - at least, until Rose farted again and his body jerked! Rose was pleased that her gas was having such an effect on Budder, after all the farts she and the rest had to put up with in the past, but she had to be careful not to show it. After all, Budder wasn't supposed to be struggling at all!

Rose waited until Budder stopped struggling, then let out a vile SBD. It wasn't quite on par with her first one, but yet again Budder's struggles intensified again.

"This won't do, Budderball!" Rosebud snapped, though she wasn't quite able to keep the glee from her voice. "I am not going to leave you alone until you stop struggling! Understand?"

No doubt Budder heard, but Rose realised that he couldn't answer anyways. He still was shifting around, trying to do something about her latest fart. Rose watched him closely, patiently, ready to fart again if he started to struggle again.

This torture continued in this manner, Rose farting every time Budder stopped struggling only for him to start it up again. At some point, Budder stopped struggling; this was because...
1112212121212.title: Started struggling wildly!

11122121212121.content:
Rosebud's gas was far, far worse than the previous two. Each time she farted, Budderball struggled almost involuntarily. It was like his body was physically rejecting the putrid stink, regardless of if he wanted to sit still! And of course, more struggling meant more farts. Budderball was constantly blasted with fart after fart, forced to inhale the nauseating stench of his sister's gas! He hated it! And frankly, he was starting to wonder if it'd just be better to sniff all his siblings again. At least that way he'd pass out faster!

Rosebud, however, was having a grand time! Well...sort of. She loved that she could finally get back at her brother for all his gas, but honestly, her farts grossed her out as well! She was doing a much better job of hiding it, especially since she wasn't at the source, but the fog of farts that surrounded the two was frankly starting to make her dizzy! Rose wasn't sure how much longer she could keep this up! Thankfully, after a chain of three horrendous, trumpeting blasts, Budder still hadn't moved an inch. Rose looked back and couldn't help but laugh at what she saw! Budder was cross eyed and swaying like a drunk! He was too weak and dizzy from her farts to struggle anymore!

"Wow bro! I didn't expect you to be THIS much of a wimp! Then again, my gas is super gross...I think I might pass out too if I have to smell anymore! So...I'm going to fart one last time. If you make it through without struggling or fainting, I'll leave and Mudbud can take his turn. If you DO struggle or pass out...we're going to go back to ganging up on you!"

Budder didn't have time to agree or disagree as a godawful stench washed over him! Another SBD! And it was by far the smelliest fart Rosebud had ever produced! As Budder choked on the overwhelming stench though, he noticed that his sister was swaying a bit too!
11122121212121.title: He had become too physically weak to struggle.

11122122.content:
Budderball lazily stretched and sniffed the air, grinning when he discovered that the room still reeked of his farts. He looked around and saw that both Rosebud and Mudbud had woken up and fled. As he wandered the house, Budderball discovered that B-Dawg and Buddha had done the same. "Well would you look at that? Everyone's afraid of me and my gas! Oh this is just too funny." Unfortunately for the four pups in hiding, the smell of Budder's farts still clung to their fur and Budderball easily tracked their steps to a small closet where he could hear his siblings arguing.

"Ugh, Buddha, can you move over? You stink!"

"You're one to talk sister. You smell worse than I do."

"Well at least I don't smell as bad Mudbud!"

"Hey! It's not my fault that Budderball almost killed me with his farts, cut me some slack."

"Well you still stink! Seriously, I think I'd rather sniff Budderball's butt than this."

Budderball giggled and pushed the sliding door open, "that can be arranged!" The four pups gasped, but before they could flee, Budderball closed the door and blocked it with his body. "Wow, you guys really do stink! Mind if I spray a bit of 'air freshener'?"

PPPPPHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRRPPPPTTTTTTT!!

The eggy stench of Budderball's gas filled the tiny space, leaving his siblings gasping for air. "Aaaaaahhh, much better, but still not enough. Luckily I have plenty!"

FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRPPPPTTTTTTTTT!!!

The stench in the closet practically doubled, making Rosebud pass out cold and leaving the others in a choking fit. Budder laughed and said "aaaaaaannd she's out. Hey, there's a fun idea. I'm going to keep farting in here, whoever passes out last gets to be my fart cushion for the next two hours!" With that, Budder started filling the closet with even more of his paint-peeling farts. In the end, the "lucky" winner was...
11122122.title: That the room was completely empty, everyone mu...

choices: Missy (Sissy's pink dog, super obscure choice.)
Other (In case a third dog character appeared and I forgot.)
13.content: Ok, we all know the obvious choice, but for the sake of options...
13.title: Johnny Test

131.content: So who's the fan favorite gassing?
131.title: Dukey...

choices: Dukey had waited long enough. (Torture route.)
1311.content:
It was a normal day in Porkbelly as the Test family was packing up the car, the girls were entering a science competition out of state, and Johnny's parents were going with them. Johnny was still asleep when the other's finished packing, he told them the night before he wasn't leaving Dukey with some random sitter so Johnny was to stay behind with the dog.

An hour after the family left, Dukey was getting bored, so he went to Johnny's room and tried waking him up. Eventually...
1311.title: Johnny Test

13112.content:
"Well if he can't even wake up, how's he supposed be in charge of me..." That's when he got the idea. "...I think I'll take charge today." Dukey then went to the shed and got some rope, then came back upstairs and tied the sleepyhead to the bed. Dukey's stomach burgled a bit. "Heheheh... Your gonna regret feeding me that awful meatloaf all the time."

As Dukey laughed to himself, Johnny woke up, noticing he was tied to the bed. "Hey Dukey, sorry I slept in now let me go." Dukey kept laughing and sat next to Johnny's head. "I don't take orders from slaves." Before Johnny could protest Dukey lifted a leg and forced the boy's face into his butt before letting out a rancid fart. "Enjoy my farts, you'll be sniffing them all day slave." Dukey let out two wetter, stinkier farts and shouted, "I don't hear sniffing!" Johnny gagged for about a minute until he decided...
13112.title: Dukey had waited long enough. (Torture route.)

choices: Find something in the lab to give him stronger farts
Wait for Johnny to wake up
Use his gas to mess with someone else
131122.content:
Johnny knew all too well how bad Dukey's farts could get, and he was certainly not going to sniff them! The boy struggled and squirmed, trying to get free from his bindings and away from the smelly mutt. However, no matter how much he struggled, the ropes never loosened, all Johnny managed to do was tire himself out and irritate Dukey. "Hey! I said sniff!" With that, Dukey pushed Johnny back onto the bed before sitting down on the boy's face, "there, now you don't have any choice but to smell my gas." With a grunt of effort, Dukey pushed on his gut and...

PPPPPPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHHHRRRRRRRPPPPPPTTTTT!!

A humongous gas blast rushed out of the mutt's backside and straight up Johnny's nose. Johnny coughed, gagged, and screamed in agony as pure fart gas burned his throat and filled his lungs, this was even worse than those aliens on the moon! And while Johnny writhed in agony, Dukey simply sat there and laughed, "awww, what's wrong Johnny? Can't take it? Well too bad, maybe now you'll think twice before shoveling that disgusting slop your dad calls food down my throat!"

FFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTT!! PPPPPBBBBBBBBBBBBBTTT!! FFFFFRRRPPP! BBBBBRRRRRRPPPPTTTT!

The farts just kept on coming until, after one final nauseating SBD, Johnny passed out from the stench. Upon feeling his owner go limp, Dukey cackled, "oh come on! You didn't even last half an hour." Dukey stood off the unconscious boy and decided to...
131122.title: Eww... No way. (Unwilling route.)

choices: Susan or Mary. (Or both, both is nice.)
1312.content: Who will Dukey gas then?
1312.title: Another Test family member.

155331.content: There have been a few dogs on the show, but since Zoe's the only one that's a main character, why not her?
155331.title: Yes

choices: It was loud enough to be heard on the other side of the day camp
1553311.content:
Zoe's stomach rumbled. Oh, why did Mrs. Twombly have to change our food? she thought. I don't know what was in that kibble, but it really doesn't agree with me.

Zoe was sitting in front of her mirror, attempting to be her usual self by trying on different fashion accessories and trying out new fashion poses, but the gas in her belly could no longer be ignored. She looked around the day camp, partly to see if any of the other pets seemed to have similar discomfort and partly to make sure she was far away from everyone else. She had an appearance to maintain, after all, and farting was just about the most un-Diva thing she could think of.

To her surprise, none of the other pets seemed to have anything wrong with them. Vinnie was dancing, Sunil was practicing his magic act, Minka was painting, Russel was obsessively double checking whether all the toys were sorted in the right order or not... everyone was acting normal. Unfortunately, however, she was not quite alone. "Hey, Zoe!" Pepper called.

Great. Zoe sarcastically thought, just the pet I wanted to see right now. Zoe never had much against the skunk, but Pepper, the self-described comedienne of the day camp, was bound to make more jokes if Zoe relieved herself near her. "Yes, Pepper?" Zoe answered.

"Just wanted someone to try a couple new jokes out on," she explained. "What do you get when you cross a giraffe with a turtle?"

"What?" Zoe asked. Please don't be funny, she hoped. If she laughed, she would surely fart by accident.

"A really big turtleneck!" Pepper said.

Phew, Zoe sighed. For once, she was glad one of Pepper's jokes was too dumb to find funny.

"Get it? A... really big turtle neck? 'Cause giraffes... long necks," Pepper awkwardly explained. "Okay, I guess that was kinda corny even for me, but this next one oughtta be better. What do you call a..."

"Hey, Pepper, get over here! I need a model to paint!" Minka called out.

"Sure thing. Hey, Minka, what do you get when you cross a giraffe with a turtle?" Pepper asked as she started to leave Zoe's earshot.

"Well that takes care of that," Zoe thought. She looked around once more just to reassure herself no one was near and now that she was alone, she decided to let it rip. The question is, how loud was it?
1553311.title: Zoe Trent it is!

15533112.content:
Zoe bit her lip. She knew now was her best shot at letting it rip unnoticed. Unfortunately, there was no such luck. When she heard how noisy her fart was, she wanted to stop it, but her body refused to let her. There she stood for several seconds as the fart forced its way out of her.

Zoe froze, too embarrassed to look at any of the other pets. She knew all eyes were on her. There was no way any of them failed to hear it. For a brief, cruel moment that felt like an eternity, Zoe waited for a reaction. She was sure her friends were going to either be grossed out or make fun of her.

Zoe's stomach gurgled once more. You've got to be kidding me, she thought. As loud and long as her fart was, she hardly felt any relief. But before she could even think about how she was going to deal with it, she decided there was no point hiding from the inevitable. She looked at her friends to see their reaction. What was it?
15533112.title: It was loud enough to be heard on the other sid...

155331122.content:
Most of her friends were clutching their noses. Zoe even saw Russell's eyes watering. Just then, Zoe got a whiff of it, herself. It wasn't quite as unpleasant to her since she was the one who it belonged to, but she could certainly understand their reaction. Other than simply being very loud and very long, this fart reeked. Zoe's stomach gurgled. And there's more, she thought.

As expected, however, Pepper was laughing wildly. After a few seconds, Pepper noticed her friends desperately trying to wave the stink away. "Oh, come on, you guys, it doesn't smell that bad."

"That's easy for you to say - you're a skunk!" Sunil complained in a nasally voice from holding his nose.

"Even if I wasn't, I am a comedienne," Pepper said, "and I know funny."

Zoe nervously whimpered when she realized she could not hold it in much longer. Before she knew it, an even longer blast exploded out of her backside. She blushed as her friends (besides Pepper) began fanning their noses and complaining.

"Oh, don't worry about them, Zoe," Pepper said with a chuckle, walking up to the flatulent canine, "they've got no sense of humor."

"How can you be laughing? I feel like I'm going to explode," Zoe complained.

"You're not going to explode," Pepper said. "You're just going to fart. A lot. Come on, Zoe, you've got gas, you might as well have some fun with it."

Does Zoe listen to Pepper's suggestion?

info.brief_description: Revival of an old interactive story by Chaz625
info.description:
The original Anime Dog fart Torture has been gone for well over a year now and I've finally decided to try and bring it back to life. The original story was my absolute favorite Interactive on the site and it was pretty much the only reason I created my account way back when. So I've decided to attempt to bring the old story back, I highly doubt that I can completely restore it to it's former glory but I hope that I can create a passable remake.

So, now let's get down to the rules:

-Other than farts and the torturing of individuals with said farts, no fetish type stuff is allowed.

-No vanilla sex stuff either!

-No killing of characters

-No one sentence story chapters. It's fine for the beginning "choose the character" type chapters, but I don't want to be in the middle of a storyline and see "Budderball farted, it smelled bad." and nothing else. That said, chapters don't have to be HUGE either, I'd say at LEAST six sentences and I'm happy.

-The individuals carrying out the fart torture must be dogs (or wolves, hyenas, jackals, marmosets... wait no, not marmosets). However, their victims don't necessarily have to be.

-The genre of the characters isn't necessarily "Anime", It's pretty much any sort of fictitious medium that contains canine characters.

-Finally, try to use good spelling, grammar and all that good stuff. If no one can understand it, I'm deleting it.

EDIT: Anthropomorphic canines from various media are also allowed. (Can't believe I forgot to include this.)
